---
# ============================================
# ESSENTIAL: Edit these for your presentation
# ============================================
title: |
    ![](assets/infosci-logo.png){width="50%"}

subtitle: |
    **Your Presentation Title**<br />
    Event or Conference Name

author:
  - name: Your Name
    email: youremail@arizona.edu
    affiliations:
      - name: University of Arizona
        department: College of Information Science

date: today

# Footer shown on every slide
footer: "Your Name | Event Name | Date"

# ============================================
# OPTIONAL: Uncomment and configure as needed
# ============================================

# ORCID (shows icon next to author name)
# author:
#   - name: Your Name
#     orcid: 0000-0000-0000-0000

# QR Code and Contact Slide Settings
params:
  follow_along_url: "https://your-slides-url.com"  # URL for QR code
  speaker_image: ""        # Path to headshot, or "" for icon placeholder
  speaker_title: ""        # e.g., "PhD", "Assistant Professor"
  show_persistent_qr: false  # Show small QR in corner of every slide
  # Social links (set to "" to hide any of these)
  website_url: ""
  github_url: ""
  linkedin_url: ""

# Bibliography (delete if not using citations)
bibliography: references.bib
csl: assets/apa.csl
# nocite: '@*'  # Uncomment to show all refs even if not cited

# ============================================
# FORMAT: Generally don't need to change these
# ============================================
title-meta: "Presentation Title - Your Name"
title-slide-attributes:
  data-state: "no-logo"

format:
  revealjs:
    theme: [default, infosci-theme.scss]
    logo: "assets/infosci-logo.png"
    slide-number: true
    show-slide-number: all
    transition: slide
    background-transition: fade
    width: 1920
    height: 1080
    embed-resources: true
---

```{r}
#| include: false
# Generate persistent QR code if enabled
if (isTRUE(params$show_persistent_qr) && nzchar(params$follow_along_url)) {
  library(qrcode)
  qr <- qr_code(params$follow_along_url)
  qr_path <- "assets/persistent-qr.svg"
  generate_svg(qr, filename = qr_path, show = FALSE)
}
```

# {#follow-along data-menu-title="Follow Along" data-state="no-logo" background-color="#0C234B" background-image="assets/infosci-logo-reverse.png" background-size="25%" background-position="right 5% top 5%"}

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
# Inject persistent QR code CSS if enabled
if (isTRUE(params$show_persistent_qr) && file.exists("assets/persistent-qr.svg")) {
  cat('
<style>
.reveal::after {
  content: "";
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 10px;
  left: 10px;
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  background-image: url("assets/persistent-qr.svg");
  background-size: contain;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  opacity: 0.8;
  z-index: 100;
  pointer-events: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
}
</style>
')
}
```
